events.name: Niger Orders French Ambassador to Leave
events.wd_label: Niger Orders French Ambassador to Leave
events.wd_description: Coup leaders in Niger have ordered the French ambassador to leave the country within 48 hours, amidst worsening bilateral ties between France and Niger.
events.description: Coup leaders in Niger have ordered the French ambassador to leave the country within 48 hours, amidst worsening bilateral ties between France and Niger.

events.name: Expulsion Order
events.wd_description: The Junta confirmed that French ambassador Sylvain Itte was ordered to leave Niger within 48 hours for refusing to respond to a meeting with Niger's foreign minister.
events.description: The Junta confirmed that French ambassador Sylvain Itte was ordered to leave Niger within 48 hours for refusing to respond to a meeting with Niger's foreign minister.

events.name: France's Response
events.wd_description: France rejected the expulsion order, stating that the junta does not have the authority to make such a request and that the ambassador's approval comes solely from the legitimate elected Nigerien authorities.
events.description: France rejected the expulsion order, stating that the junta does not have the authority to make such a request and that the ambassador's approval comes solely from the legitimate elected Nigerien authorities.

events.name: Promise to Return Civilian Control
events.wd_description: The coup leader, Gen Abdourahamane Tchiani, promised to return control of the country to civilians within three years during a meeting with mediators from ECOWAS.
events.description: The coup leader, Gen Abdourahamane Tchiani, promised to return control of the country to civilians within three years during a meeting with mediators from ECOWAS.

events.name: North Korea Fires Suspected ICBM
events.wd_description: North Korea fired a suspected intercontinental ballistic missile (ICBM) that landed in Japanese waters, prompting increased joint military drills by the United States and South Korea.
events.description: North Korea fired a suspected intercontinental ballistic missile (ICBM) that landed in Japanese waters, prompting increased joint military drills by the United States and South Korea.

events.name: Missile Launch Details
events.wd_description: The suspected ICBM launched by North Korea flew for over one hour before landing in Japanese waters on Wednesday morning.
events.description: The suspected ICBM launched by North Korea flew for over one hour before landing in Japanese waters on Wednesday morning.

events.name: Response by the United States and South Korea
events.wd_label: Response by the United States and South Korea
events.wd_description: The United States and South Korea increased their joint military drills around the Korean peninsula in response to North Korea's missile launch.
events.description: The United States and South Korea increased their joint military drills around the Korean peninsula in response to North Korea's missile launch.

events.name: Emergency Meeting by South Korea
events.wd_description: South Korean President Yoon Suk-Yeol convened an emergency meeting of his national security council while attending the NATO summit in Lithuania.
events.description: South Korean President Yoon Suk-Yeol convened an emergency meeting of his national security council while attending the NATO summit in Lithuania.

events.name: Treason Charges Against Former Ukrainian Security Officials
events.wd_label: Treason Charges Against Former Ukrainian Security Officials
events.wd_description: Ukrainian authorities have charged former top security officials with treason as part of efforts to identify and remove Russian spies within the country’s security services.
events.description: Ukrainian authorities have charged former top security officials with treason as part of efforts to identify and remove Russian spies within the country’s security services.

events.name: Arrest of Oleh Kulinich
events.wd_description: Oleh Kulinich, the former head of the Security Service of Ukraine’s (SBU) Crimea directorate, was arrested on charges of requiring other Russian-friendly operatives on orders from Russia.
events.description: Oleh Kulinich, the former head of the Security Service of Ukraine’s (SBU) Crimea directorate, was arrested on charges of requiring other Russian-friendly operatives on orders from Russia.

events.name: Investigation of Andriy Naumov
events.wd_description: Authorities are investigating Andriy Naumov, the former head of the SBU’s Department of Internal Security, who arrived in Serbia with a car full of cash and emeralds.
events.description: Authorities are investigating Andriy Naumov, the former head of the SBU’s Department of Internal Security, who arrived in Serbia with a car full of cash and emeralds.

events.name: Sacking of Ivan Bakanov
events.wd_description: The former SBU chief, Ivan Bakanov, was sacked by President Volodymyr Zelenskiy as part of the efforts to remove compromised officials.
events.description: The former SBU chief, Ivan Bakanov, was sacked by President Volodymyr Zelenskiy as part of the efforts to remove compromised officials.

events.name: DOE Funding Opportunity for EV Battery Recycling
events.wd_label: DOE Funding Opportunity for EV Battery Recycling
events.wd_description: The U.S. Department of Energy (DOE) plans to release a funding opportunity to advance electric vehicle (EV) battery recycling, transportation, and design with up to $37 million from Bipartisan Infrastructure Law (BIL) funding.
events.description: The U.S. Department of Energy (DOE) plans to release a funding opportunity to advance electric vehicle (EV) battery recycling, transportation, and design with up to $37 million from Bipartisan Infrastructure Law (BIL) funding.

events.name: BIL Section 40208
events.wd_description: The anticipated FOA supports BIL section 40208, which aims to research, develop, and demonstrate second-life applications for electric drive vehicle batteries and technologies for final recycling and disposal.
events.description: The anticipated FOA supports BIL section 40208, which aims to research, develop, and demonstrate second-life applications for electric drive vehicle batteries and technologies for final recycling and disposal.

events.name: High-Capacity Battery Supply Chain
events.wd_description: The high-capacity battery supply chain consists of raw material production, materials processing, battery material manufacturing and cell fabrication, battery pack and end-use product manufacturing, and battery end-of-life and recycling.
events.description: The high-capacity battery supply chain consists of raw material production, materials processing, battery material manufacturing and cell fabrication, battery pack and end-use product manufacturing, and battery end-of-life and recycling.

events.name: t: Raw Material Production
events.wd_description: The extraction and production of raw materials essential for battery manufacturing.
events.description: The extraction and production of raw materials essential for battery manufacturing.

events.name: t: Materials Processing
events.wd_description: The processing of raw materials into forms suitable for battery manufacturing.
events.description: The processing of raw materials into forms suitable for battery manufacturing.

events.name: t: Battery Material Manufacturing and Cell Fabrication
events.wd_label: t: Battery Material Manufacturing and Cell Fabrication
events.wd_description: The manufacturing of battery materials and the fabrication of battery cells.
events.description: The manufacturing of battery materials and the fabrication of battery cells.

events.name: t: Battery Pack and End-Use Product Manufacturing
events.wd_label: t: Battery Pack and End-Use Product Manufacturing
events.wd_description: The assembly of battery packs and their integration into end-use products.
events.description: The assembly of battery packs and their integration into end-use products.

events.name: t: Battery End-of-Life and Recycling
events.wd_description: The collection, disassembly, and recycling of batteries at the end of their life cycle.
events.description: The collection, disassembly, and recycling of batteries at the end of their life cycle.

events.name: FOA Focus Areas
events.wd_description: The FOA will focus on reducing the costs of battery recycling through improved technologies, processes, and product designs, including the recycling of battery accessory components.
events.description: The FOA will focus on reducing the costs of battery recycling through improved technologies, processes, and product designs, including the recycling of battery accessory components.

events.name: t: Transportation and Preprocessing Technologies
events.wd_description: Technologies and processes that facilitate the transport, disassembly, and preprocessing of end-of-life electric drive vehicle batteries to reduce costs.
events.description: Technologies and processes that facilitate the transport, disassembly, and preprocessing of end-of-life electric drive vehicle batteries to reduce costs.

events.name: t: Safety Improvements
events.wd_description: Technologies and product designs that improve the safety of transporting and disassembling end-of-life electric drive vehicle batteries.
events.description: Technologies and product designs that improve the safety of transporting and disassembling end-of-life electric drive vehicle batteries.

events.name: t: Accessory Component Recycling
events.wd_description: Technologies and processes for the recycling and disposal of battery accessory components, including casings and enclosures made from plastics and polymer composites.
events.description: Technologies and processes for the recycling and disposal of battery accessory components, including casings and enclosures made from plastics and polymer composites.
